ul: Organize the Software Development Processes for PCI DSS Compliance
li: Organize the Software Development Processes for PCI DSS Compliance
p: Live PANs and other production data should not be used for testing or development. If PANs are used, they should be sanitized before use.

There may be vulnerabilities in the testing and development environments that may cause unauthorized disclosure. The access controls in the testing and development environments are often not as strict as in the production environment, so using live PANs
 may lead to unauthorized disclosure.
Interview the responsible staff members to make sure they don't use live PANs or other production data for testing or development.

Add a point to the information security policy to not use live PANs or other production data for testing or development. Instruct the responsible staff members to not use live PANs or other production data for testing or development.
Organize the Software Development Processes for PCI DSS Compliance
a: Organize the Software Development Processes for PCI DSS Compliance

links.text: Organize the Software Development Processes for PCI DSS Compliance

html:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 6.3

What to Check For

Live PANs and other production data should not be used for testing or development. If PANs are used, they should be sanitized before use.

Why

There may be vulnerabilities in the testing and development environments that may cause unauthorized disclosure. The access controls in the testing and development environments are often not as strict as in the production environment, so using live PANs may lead to unauthorized disclosure.

How to Check

Interview the responsible staff members to make sure they don't use live PANs or other production data for testing or development.

How to Fix

Add a point to the information security policy to not use live PANs or other production data for testing or development. Instruct the responsible staff members to not use live PANs or other production data for testing or development.

Related Items

  • Organize the Software Development Processes for PCI DSS Compliance
